About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

Onyebuchi is a trained Project Manager and IT professional experienced in front-end web development and proficient in the use of web technologies, graphics, database and content management system packages. He is innovative and has demonstrated exceptional leadership qualities as a teacher and training instructor. He is keen on taking on new opportunities and challenges in the IT sector.
